Description:
Detects DNS queries to a TeamViewer domain only resolved by a TeamViewer client by an image that isn't named TeamViewer (sometimes used by threat actors for obfuscation)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: TeamViewer Domain Query By Non-TeamViewer Application
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((query_name = 'taf.teamviewer.com' or query_name = 'udp.ping.teamviewer.com') and  not process_path like '%teamviewer%')
